title: 4 Little Girls
actors: Maxine McNair, Chris McNair, Helen Pegues, Queen Nunn
plot: This film recounts the people and events leading up to the one of the most despicable hate-crimes during the height of the civil-rights movement, the bombing of the 16th Street Church in Birmingham, Alabama. In that attack, four little African-American girls lost their lives and a nation was simultaneously revolted, angered and galvanized to push the fight for equality and justice on.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 9 wins & 10 nominations.
name: 4 Little Girls
